CustomField.formula:
CASE( BFIN_EmailOpt_Out__c , "Yes", IMAGE ("/resource/1494343076000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/cancel.png", "Inactive"), "", IMAGE ("/resource/1494343076000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/tick.png", "Active"), "No", IMAGE ("/resource/1494343076000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/tick.png", "Active"), IMAGE ("/resource/1494343076000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/cancel.png", "Inactive")
)
CustomField.label: BFIN Allow email
